Nobile goal behind the Safety in South China Sea

/ > notes > future_projections-in_A_Better_World


Created: 12/30/2024

Give God's Light to the potentially present intelligent "wintering" planetary neighbors of Europa, Pluto, ...

Goal: Prevent casualties in open (armed) conflicts - stop killing ourselves before learning not to kill others

  • Self Determination: A new global popular representation body (UN House of Representatives)
  • Security: Naval territorial control cooperation
  • Prosperity: ..., Joint industrial capacity development for boundary management, ...
  • Positive Long Term Outlook: South China Sea as the most secure body of water on the planet, where "not a single crab is unaccounted for".
  • Active External Forces: Philippines, Indonesia, Malaysia, Brunei, Singapore, Thailand, Cambodia, Vietnam, PRC/Taiwan. Outer perimeter aids: India, Australia, USA, Japan, RF. Possible future pilot observers: Perisian gulf countries, Red Sea countries, Sea of Japan countries.
